theme: Municipal governance and institution building,Urban services and housing for the poor,Decentralization

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objectives of the Urban
            Infrastructure Project are as follows: (i) improved
            provision and maintenance of priority urban infrastructure;
            and (ii) increased income and employment for the poor.  The
            project will comprise the following components: 1) civil
            works, including contracts for construction/rehabilitation
            of economic infrastructure and revenue earning projects; 2)
            equipment, consisting of laboratory and machines to produce
            precast cement blocks for pavement in cities where capacity
            is weak, as well as office equipment; 3) consultancy
            services to assist municipalities and beneficiaries to
            formulate and evaluate Priority Investment Programs of
            Municipalities (PIPMs) and to Agence d'Execution des
            Travaux d'Infrastructure Publique (AGETIP) to conduct
            analysis and training for small and medium enterprises
            (SMEs), to facilitate participatory seminars, to provide
            information services and to finance technical and financial
            audits; and 4) project management-AGETIP(s) management costs.
